name: Watermark VideoBot
description: A Modular telegram bot for Screenshots & Trim Videos.

AUTH_USERS.description: Admin(s) of the bot. User's telegram id separated by space. Atleast one id should be specified.

HOST.description: Public URL of file streaming service

SESSION_NAME.description: Name you want to call your bot's session, Eg: bot's username.

MAX_PROCESSES_PER_USER.description: Number of parallel processes each user can have, defaults to 2.

TRACK_CHANNEL.description: User activity tracking channel's id. Only needed if you want to track and block any user. Disabled by default.

SLOW_SPEED_DELAY.description: Delay required between each interaction from users in seconds. Defaults to 5s.

TIMEOUT.description: Maximum time alloted to each process in seconds, after which process will be cancelled. Defaults to 1800s(30 mins).

DEBUG.description: Set some value to use DEBUG logging level. INFO by default.

WORKER_COUNT.description: Number of process to be handled at a time. Defaults to 20.
